# Kaiser Klowns

> Kaiser Klowns is a premier luxury creative conglomerate managing five distinct Houses: Maventine, Aurelic Systems, KurenTengu, Velvessence Studios, and Lokovox Media. Founded in September 2025, Kaiser Klowns bridges the gap between uncompromising heritage and visionary innovation across fashion, technology, spirits, beauty, and media.

## About

Kaiser Klowns Group is a holding company that oversees a portfolio of luxury and creative brands. The group operates under a philosophy of "Silent Authority" — strategic, intelligent, and rooted in heritage. Each House operates independently while sharing a common commitment to excellence, craftsmanship, and forward-thinking innovation.

- Website: [https://www.kaiserklowns.group](https://www.kaiserklowns.group)
- Contact: [https://www.kaiserklowns.group/contact](https://www.kaiserklowns.group/contact)
- Careers: [https://www.kaiserklowns.group/careers](https://www.kaiserklowns.group/careers)

## Houses (Sub-brands)

### Maventine
- Description: Luxury Fashion House specializing in high-end fashion and street-tailoring
- Focus: Premium clothing, accessories, and lifestyle products
- More info: [https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/maventine](https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/maventine)

### Aurelic Systems
- Description: Advanced Technology & AI company
- Focus: Artificial intelligence, machine learning, enterprise automation, and productivity software
- Key Product: Arkai Work Assistant — an AI-powered enterprise productivity platform
- More info: [https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/aurelic-systems](https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/aurelic-systems)

### KurenTengu
- Description: Premium Spirits & Beverages brand
- Focus: Craft spirits, artisanal beverages, and premium drink experiences
- More info: [https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/kurentengu](https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/kurentengu)

### Velvessence Studios
- Description: Beauty & Wellness studio
- Focus: Premium beauty products, wellness solutions, and self-care innovations
- More info: [https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/velvessence-studios](https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/velvessence-studios)

### Lokovox Media
- Description: Media & Entertainment company
- Focus: Media production, entertainment content, storytelling, and creative media experiences
- More info: [https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/lokovox-media](https://www.kaiserklowns.group/houses/lokovox-media)
